ModMetaData.name: Misc. Objects
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** You must load Miscellaneous CORE first for this to work without errors! ***
-Nano Replicator Like a 3D-Printer only for much more complex items Needs to be researched. -Turret: Weapon Base You want to build your own turrets? Buy an automatic base from a trader and add your weapon of choice to it. The manable weapon base needs the research 'Smithing'.
Special thanks to mrofa for the graphics. (Version: 0.14.5) Language: English, German
